table_caption: Correlation coefficients of FA and MD to perceptual speed before and after exclusion of persons in a preclinical dementia phase.
table_foot: * p < 0.05, **p < 0.01Note. FA = fractional anisotropy, MD = mean diffusivity, CCG = cingulum cingulate gyrus, CHC = cingulum hippocampus, CS = corticospinal tract, FMAJ = forceps major, FMIN = forceps minor, IFOF = inferior fronto-occipital Fasciculus, SLF = superior longitudinal fasciculus. All analyses were adjusted for age.
